summary: A simple mod that changes the prices for wild animal drops by raising them by 5/10/20x.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]This is a simple mod that changes the prices for wild animal drops by raising them by 5/10/20x. [/size]


[size=2]My character is usually a hunter and I've always found that hunting just... Wasn't rewarding enough. I've downloaded a few mods that just added too much. So, I decided to create a mod that just raises the prices and decided to share it.[/size]



[b][u][size=3]Current versions:
[/size][/u][/b]
[size=2][b]Skyrim Lite Version (alchemy ingredients not affected): [/b]Only hides, pelts, tusks and meats are affected. [/size]




[b][size=3]([u]To make[/u])[/size][/b]
[b]Full Version (alchemy ingredients affected): [/b]Every drop is affected.



[size=3][b]Versions that I might make:
[/b][/size]Legendary (All DLCs) versions.


[b][u]Requirements:[/u][/b]
[size=2]- Skyrim[/size]


This mod should work with everything that doesn't edit the prices of animal hides, pelts, tusks, and meats.
Let me know if there are any problems or if you want me to add anything to the mod.
author: Richard
